title: Update About Me copy to 8+ years experience

requirements.summary: Update the About Me section copy to say "8+ years" instead of "6+ years" with no other changes.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/components/portfolio/AboutSection.tsx, the first paragraph under "About Me" says "8+ years" (not "6+ years").
No other About Me wording, layout, styles, or animations are changed aside from the experience number update.
The About section renders successfully with no TypeScript/React build errors.

file_operations.description: Replace the "6+ years" phrase in the first About Me paragraph with "8+ years", keeping all other text, layout, styling classes, and reveal animation logic unchanged.
